對.definition: right; correct; towards; at; for; concerning; regarding; to treat (sb a certain way); to face; (bound form) opposite; facing; matching; to match together; to adjust; to fit; to suit; to answer; to reply; to add; to pour in (a fluid); to check; to compare; classifier: couple; pair

對上.definition: to fit one into the other; to bring two things into contact

對不上.definition: to disagree; I can't agree with that.

對不住.definition: to let sb down; to be unfair; I'm sorry; pardon me (formal)

對不對.definition: right or wrong?; Is it right?; OK, yes? (colloquial)

對不起.definition: I'm sorry; excuse me; I beg your pardon; to let (sb) down; to disappoint

對么.definition: pair of aces (in dominoes); double one

對乙酰氨基酚.pinyin: duì yǐ xiān ān jī fēn

對了.definition: Correct!; Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention); Oh, by the way, ...

對仗.definition: antithesis (two lines of poetry matching in sense and sound); to fight; to wage war

對付.definition: to handle; to deal with; to tackle; to get by with; to make do; (dialect) (usu. used in the negative) to get along with (sb)

對位.definition: counterpoint (in music etc); to align; alignment

對偶.definition: dual; duality; antithesis; coupled phrases (as rhetorical device); spouse

對價.definition: consideration (in exchange for shares); a quid pro quo

對勁.definition: suitable; to one's liking; to get along together

對勁兒.definition: erhua variant of 對勁|对劲[dui4 jin4]

對口.definition: (of two performers) to speak or sing alternately; to be fit for the purposes of a job or task; (of food) to suit sb's taste

對口徑.definition: to arrange to give the same story

對口相聲.definition: comic crosstalk; formalized comic dialogue between two stand-up comics: funny man 逗哏[dou4 gen2] and straight man 捧哏[peng3 gen2]

對合.definition: a profit equal to the amount one invested; (math.) involution

對唱.definition: in duet; answering phrase; antiphonal answer

對壘.definition: to face off against one's adversary (military, sports etc)

對外.definition: external; foreign; pertaining to external or foreign (affairs)

對外經濟貿易大學.pinyin: duì wài jīng jì mào yì dà xué
對外經濟貿易大學.definition: University of International Business and Economics

對外聯絡部.definition: CCP central committee's external affairs department (i.e. Chinese communist party's foreign office)

對子.definition: pair of antithetical phrases; antithetical couplet

對家.definition: partner (in four person game); family of proposed marriage partner

對局.definition: opposing sides (in chess etc); position (of opposing forces)

對岸.definition: opposite bank (of a body of water)

對峙.definition: (of mountains etc) to stand facing each other; (fig.) to confront each other

對得起.definition: not to let sb down; to treat sb fairly; be worthy of

對心兒.definition: erhua variant of 對心|对心[dui4 xin1]

對應.definition: to correspond (to); to be equivalent to; to be a counterpart to

對應詞.definition: (linguistics) an equivalent; a translation of a term into the target language

對抗.definition: to withstand; to resist; to stand off; antagonism; confrontation

對抗賽.definition: duel; match; competition between paired opponents (e.g. sporting)

對接.definition: to join up; to dock; a joint (between components)

對摺.definition: to sell at a 50% discount; to fold in two

對敵.definition: to confront; to face the enemy

對方.definition: the other person; the other side; the other party

對方付款電話.pinyin: duì fāng fù kuǎn diàn huà

對方付費電話.pinyin: duì fāng fù fèi diàn huà

對於.definition: regarding; as far as (sth) is concerned; with regard to

對映.definition: to be the mirror image of sth; enantiomorphic; antipodal; enantiomeric (chemistry)

對本.definition: (a return) equal to the capital; 100 percent profit

對杯.definition: to raise glasses together; to toast one another

對標.definition: to compare a product with (a rival product); to benchmark against (another product)

對歌.definition: answering phrase of duet; to sing antiphonal answer

對比.definition: to contrast; contrast; ratio; CL:個|个[ge4]

對比度.definition: contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup); degree of contrast

對比溫度.definition: (thermodynamics) reduced temperature (used to compare fluids at different temperatures relative to their critical points)

對氨基苯丙酮.pinyin: duì ān jī běn bǐng tóng

對消.definition: in equilibrium; to cancel out (of opposite forces) (physics)

對準.definition: to aim at; to target; to point at; to be directed at; registration; alignment (mechanical engineering)

對火.definition: to use the tip of another person’s lit cigarette to light one's own

對照.definition: to contrast; to compare; to place side by side for comparison (as parallel texts); to check

對牛彈琴.definition: lit. to play the lute to a cow (idiom); fig. offering a treat to an unappreciative audience; to cast pearls before swine; caviar to the general; to preach to deaf ears; to talk over sb's head

對生.definition: (botany) opposite leaf arrangement; paired leaf arrangement

對症.definition: correct diagnosis; to prescribe the right cure for an illness; to suit the medicine to the illness

對症下藥.definition: lit. to prescribe the right medicine for an illness (idiom); fig. to study a problem to find the right way to solve it; to take appropriate steps

對症發藥.definition: lit. to prescribe the right medicine for an illness (idiom); fig. to study a problem to find the right way to solve it; to take appropriate steps

對白.definition: dialogue (in a movie or a play)

對稱軸.definition: axis of symmetry; central axis (in Chinese architecture)

對空射擊.definition: anti-aircraft fire; to shoot at enemy planes

對立.definition: to oppose; to set sth against; to be antagonistic to; antithetical; relative opposite; opposing; diametrical

對立面.definition: opposite; antonym; the opposite side (in a conflict)

對等.definition: equal status; equal treatment; parity (under the law); equity; reciprocity

對答.definition: to reply; to answer; response; reply

對答如流.definition: able to reply quickly and fluently (idiom); having a ready answer

對策.definition: countermeasure for dealing with a situation

對簿.definition: to confront sb with accusation; written charge in court (in former times); to take sb to court

對簿公堂.definition: public courtroom accusation (idiom); legal confrontation; to take sb to court; to sue

對罵.definition: to hurl abuse; to trade insults; slanging match

對羥基苯甲酸酯.pinyin: duì qiǎng jī běn jiǎ suān zhǐ

對聯.definition: rhyming couplet; pair of lines of verse written vertically down the sides of a doorway; CL:副[fu4],幅[fu2]

對胃口.definition: to one's taste; to one's liking

對茬兒.definition: to agree with; of the same opinion; to coincide

對著和尚罵賊禿.pinyin: duì zhù hé shàng mà zéi tū
對著和尚罵賊禿.definition: lit. in the presence of a monk, insult another monk, calling him a bald-headed bandit (idiom); fig. to insult indirectly; to criticize obliquely

對著幹.definition: to adopt confrontational posture; to meet head-on; to compete

對號.definition: tick; check mark (✓); number for verification (serial number, seat number etc); (fig.) two things match up

對號入座.definition: to take one's seat according to the ticket number; (fig.) to put (things or people) in their right place; to take a general comment as a personal attack

對襯.definition: to serve as foil to one another

對親.definition: courting; meeting for purpose of marriage; to settle into a relationship

對詞.definition: (of actors) to practice lines together; to rehearse a dialogue

對課.definition: to give answering phrase (school exercise in memory or composition)

對調.definition: to swap places; to exchange roles

對談.definition: to talk with sb (face to face); discussion; talk; chat

對象.definition: target; object; partner; boyfriend; girlfriend; CL:個|个[ge4]

對賭.definition: to place a bet (with sb); to take a risk (with one's time and effort etc, e.g. on a business venture)

對酒當歌.definition: lit. sing to accompany wine (idiom); fig. life is short, make merry while you can

對錶.definition: to set or synchronize a watch

對開.definition: running in opposite direction (buses, trains, ferries etc)

對陣.definition: poised for battle; to square up for a fight

對面.definition: (sitting) opposite; across (the street); directly in front; to be face to face

對頂角.definition: angle to the vertical; angle (between two lines or two planes)

對馬.definition: Tsushima Island, between Japan and South Korea

對馬島.definition: Tsushima Island, between Japan and South Korea

對馬海峽.definition: Tsushima Strait, between Japan and South Korea
